comments.body: For my own education regarding `partitioned index filters`, why it's worth mentioning specifically?

It is an optimization that can be applied for large (or relatively large) index/filter blocks, rather than trying to decrease their size by increasing data block size/bloom bits and can improve cache performance when index/filter blocks are contending with data blocks (or each other)
